item.title: Movement Lag
item.dc:creator: @Cyanidesuicide Cyanidesuicide
item.description:
@Cyanidesuicide wrote:

Okay, I am trying to add a pvp point system to my server which I achieved. But, when I inserted the system it lagged my serve, so whenever anyone tries to move it takes 5 seconds to move 1 square. I need to know how to fix this lag and still keep the pvp point system.

The server coding is I believe Delta, here is a example.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure") && playerRights >= 3) { addSkillXP(14000000, 0); addSkillXP(0, 1); addSkillXP(14000000, 2); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(14000000, 4); addSkillXP(0, 5); addSkillXP(14000000, 6); sM("Your Now A Pure Suicidalscape Pker"); }

There are multiple codes that I used for the pvp system. I also tried adding an Anti-lag made my Xerozcheez. and put the Anti-lag.java and Anti-lag.class by him in the server files.

Here is the code by Xerozcheez

// This resets server every 30 mins to stop lag - xerozcheez
import java.io.*;

public class antilag
{

public int ResetTimer = 60;

public void resetserver()
{
misc.println("RESETING SERVER");
misc.println("TO CUT LAG!");
misc.println("Saving all games...");
PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;
misc.println("GAME SUCCESSFULLY SAVED FOR ALL PLAYERS");
ResetTimer = 0;
closeListener();
runserver();
}
public void process()
{
ResetTimer += 1;
if(ResetTimer >= 99999999)
{
resetserver();
}
}

Does anyone know how I can fix the lag and keep the system? If so reply to this post or send me a msg on MSN at Cyanide-Suicide@live.com, Or send me a email at JosephSaavedra14@gmail.com.
Thanks in advanced,
Cyanide

Read full topic
